title: Thread 'rustc' has overflowed its stack

labels.name: I-crash
labels.description: Issue: The compiler crashes (SIGSEGV, SIGABRT, etc). Use I-ICE instead when the compiler panics.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
I've seen a few of these issues with the same names, although most of them seems to have been resolved already, while I am still having this issue. I tried this code: `cargo build` I expected to see this happen: The project builds Instead, this happened: Compiling fails with error: `thread 'rustc' has overflowed its stack` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ```rustc 1.46.0 (04488afe3 2020-08-24) binary: rustc commit-hash: 04488afe34512aa4c33566eb16d8c912a3ae04f9 commit-date: 2020-08-24 host: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc release: 1.46.0 LLVM version: 10.0 ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' has overflowed its stack error: could not compile `rust-sc2`. Caused by: process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name rust_sc2 --edition=2018 src\lib.rs --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,metadata,link -Cembed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C metadata=1e497eff6baa1de0 -C extra-filename=-1e497eff6baa1de0 --out-dir "D:\GitHub\GitHub\my rust-sc2\rust-sc2\target\debug\deps" -C "incremental=D:\GitHub\GitHub\my rust-sc2\rust-sc2\target\debug\incremental" -L "dependency=D:\GitHub\GitHub\my rust-sc2\rust-sc2\target\debug\deps" --extern "dirs=D:\GitHub\GitHub\my rust-sc2\rust-sc2\target\debug\deps\libdirs-620c345aa716c231.rmeta" --extern "indexmap=D:\GitHub\GitHub\my rust-sc2\rust-sc2\target\debug\deps\libindexmap-29ae9132dbb77537.rmeta" --extern "itertools=D:\GitHub\GitHub\my rust-sc2\rust-sc2\target\debug\deps\libitertools-c16bc1d160dea09d.rmeta" --extern "lazy_static=D:\GitHub\GitHub\my rust-sc2\rust-sc2\target\debug\deps\liblazy_static-3058c6f12d44e685.rmeta" --extern "log=D:\GitHub\GitHub\my rust-sc2\rust-sc2\target\debug\deps\liblog-08bc7377e0ffa8ec.rmeta" --extern "maplit=D:\GitHub\GitHub\my rust-sc2\rust-sc2\target\debug\deps\libmaplit-97e70e9c79d471a7.rmeta" --extern "ndarray=D:\GitHub\GitHub\my rust-sc2\rust-sc2\target\debug\deps\libndarray-96c07eb7908f0f8b.rmeta" --extern "num_derive=D:\GitHub\GitHub\my rust-sc2\rust-sc2\target\debug\deps\num_derive-bbe2b3626987e3ae.dll" --extern "num_traits=D:\GitHub\GitHub\my rust-sc2\rust-sc2\target\debug\deps\libnum_traits-9902fefc49ea4321.rmeta" --extern "protobuf=D:\GitHub\GitHub\my rust-sc2\rust-sc2\target\debug\deps\libprotobuf-59e14b9192dafe85.rmeta" --extern "rand=D:\GitHub\GitHub\my rust-sc2\rust-sc2\target\debug\deps\librand-d806b603cd150676.rmeta" --extern "regex=D:\GitHub\GitHub\my rust-sc2\rust-sc2\target\debug\deps\libregex-de2aa354decec117.rmeta" --extern "rustc_hash=D:\GitHub\GitHub\my rust-sc2\rust-sc2\target\debug\deps\librustc_hash-35a6e4b6bb7a3813.rmeta" --extern "sc2_macro=D:\GitHub\GitHub\my rust-sc2\rust-sc2\target\debug\deps\libsc2_macro-e2745bfa53fe6ef3.rmeta" --extern "sc2_proto=D:\GitHub\GitHub\my rust-sc2\rust-sc2\target\debug\deps\libsc2_proto-bd01b758f320bd91.rmeta" --extern "tungstenite=D:\GitHub\GitHub\my rust-sc2\rust-sc2\target\debug\deps\libtungstenite-7d5269fedd39e6a8.rmeta" --extern "url=D:\GitHub\GitHub\my rust-sc2\rust-sc2\target\debug\deps\liburl-1eb269bf0a5b6cec.rmeta"` (exit code: 0xc00000fd, STATUS_STACK_OVERFLOW) ```

I'm trying to build this crate [rust-sc2](https://github.com/UltraMachine/rust-sc2), but it's failing to build on 1.45.x and 1.46.0. It does build on nightly 1.47.x and 1.48.x however. I've tried running GDB to pinpoint the exact point of failure, so I can create a minimal reproducible example, but I don't know rustc well enough to make any sense of the GDB output: ``` [Thread debugging using libthread_db enabled] Using host libthread_db library "/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libthread_db.so.1". [New Thread 0x7fffee7ff700 (LWP 3510)] [New Thread 0x7fffed9ff700 (LWP 3511)] [Thread 0x7fffed9ff700 (LWP 3511) exited] warning: Missing auto-load script at offset 0 in section .debug_gdb_scripts of file /mnt/d/GitHub/GitHub/my rust-sc2/rust-sc2/target/debug/deps/libnum_derive-cc95ed615db7646f.so. Use `info auto-load python-scripts [REGEXP]' to list them. Thread 2 "rustc" received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault. [Switching to Thread 0x7fffee7ff700 (LWP 3510)] 0x00007ffff5345fb1 in rustc_mir_build::hair::cx::expr::::make_mirror () from /home/user/.rustup/toolchains/stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-1cd905f603d5b1d4.so ``` If someone could point me in the right direction, I'll try to create a MCVE
